        )

include_directories(${VPX_ROOT}/config/arm64)


add_library(libvpx STATIC ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(libvpx PUBLIC
        ${VPX_ROOT}/libvpx
        )
target_compile_options(libvpx PRIVATE
        -O3
        -Wno-unused-parameter
        )
